General.Name: High Tide Inc
General.Description: High Tide Inc. engages in the cannabis retail business in Canada, the United States, and internationally. It operates through Bricks and Mortar Operations; and E-commerce Operations segments. The company operates retail cannabis stores; and provides data analytics services. In addition, it manufactures and distributes consumption accessories. Further, the company sells its products through a network of retail stores, e-commerce platforms, and the wholesale distribution arm. It offers its products under the Daily High Club, DankStop, FABCBD, GC, Nuleaf, Smoke Cartel, Blessed CBD, Fastendr, Queen of Bud, Cabana Cannabis Co, Vodka Glass, Puff Puff Pass, Dopezilla, Atomik, Hue, and Evolution brands. The company was formerly known as High Tide Ventures Inc. and changed its name to High Tide Inc. in October 2018. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 11127 - 15 Street N.E., Calgary, AB, Canada, T3K 2M4
